meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a hydrous silicate of sodium and aluminum.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a rare analcimes specimen during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various analcimes samples from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The analcimes mineral decided to throw a party for all the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: The analcimes sparkled like tiny gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The vivid blue color of the analcimes made it stand out among the rocks.
